gobblin.metrics.reporter

Class MetricReportReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.metrics.reporter.ContextAwareReporter
      • gobblin.metrics.reporter.ScheduledReporter
        • gobblin.metrics.reporter.MetricReportReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reporter, Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KafkaReporter, OutputStreamReporter

    public abstract class MetricReportReporter
extends ScheduledReporter
    Scheduled reporter based on MetricReport.

    This class will generate a metric report, and call emitReport(gobblin.metrics.MetricReport) to actually emit the metrics.

    • Method Detail

      • report

        protected void report(SortedMap<String,Gauge> gauges,
                      SortedMap<String,Counter> counters,
                      SortedMap<String,Histogram> histograms,
                      SortedMap<String,Meter> meters,
                      SortedMap<String,Timer> timers,
                      Map<String,Object> tags,
                      boolean isFinal)
        Description copied from class: ScheduledReporter
        Report the input metrics. The input tags apply to all input metrics.

        The default implementation of this method is to ignore the value of isFinal. Sub-classes that are interested in using the value of isFinal should override this method as well as ScheduledReporter.report(SortedMap, SortedMap, SortedMap, SortedMap, SortedMap, Map). If they are not interested in the value of isFinal, they should just override ScheduledReporter.report(SortedMap, SortedMap, SortedMap, SortedMap, SortedMap, Map).

        Overrides:
        report in class ScheduledReporter
        isFinal - true if this is the final time report will be called, false otherwise

      • report

        protected void report(SortedMap<String,Gauge> gauges,
                      SortedMap<String,Counter> counters,
                      SortedMap<String,Histogram> histograms,
                      SortedMap<String,Meter> meters,
                      SortedMap<String,Timer> timers,
                      Map<String,Object> tags)
        Serializes metrics and pushes the byte arrays to Kafka. Uses the serialize* methods in MetricReportReporter.
        Specified by:
        report in class ScheduledReporter
        Parameters:
        gauges - map of Gauge to report and their name.
        counters - map of Counter to report and their name.
        histograms - map of Histogram to report and their name.
        meters - map of Meter to report and their name.
        timers - map of Timer to report and their name.
        See Also:
        #report(SortedMap, SortedMap, SortedMap, SortedMap, SortedMap, Map)}

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Description copied from class: ContextAwareReporter
        Removes ContextAwareReporter records from the RootMetricContext. This method should be considered irreversible and destructive to the ContextAwareReporter.
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Overrides:
        close in class ScheduledReporter
        Throws:
        IOException
